name: lifecraft
description: | VERB   | PATH             | DESCRIPTION                   | | ------ | ---------------- | ----------------------------- | | GET    | /crafts          | index of sale items           | | GET    | /crafts/:id      | show page for selected item   | | GET    | /crafts/new      | page to add new item for sale | | POST   | /crafts          | add a new item for sale       | | GET    | /crafts/:id/edit | page to edit exisiting item   | | PUT    | /crafts/:id      | edit/update a sale item       | | DELETE | /crafts/:id      | delete a item                 |
